nodes.text: The Ithorian Jho operated an antique freight hauler. A few years before the Battle of Yavin, Jho used it to evacuate the Spanjaf and Leonis families from Lothal ahead of Imperial searchers. Jho described the hauler's hyperdrive motivator as "iffy," but usable for short trips. It also possessed weaponry capable of blasting Imperial speeder bikes into ruins.
Jho's starship appears in the 2015 canon young readers book Servants of the Empire: The Secret Academy, written by Jason Fry.
